psxctl:ControlMeta.name: sys_CalendarSimple
psxctl:ControlMeta.psxctl:Description: A input box with icon to pop-up calendar picker

psxctl:Param.name: id
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter assigns a name to an element. This name must be unique in a document.

psxctl:Param.name: class
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter assigns a class name or set of class names to an element. Any number of elements may be assigned the same class name or names. Multiple class names must be separated by white space characters. The default value is "datadisplay".

psxctl:Param.name: style
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies style information for the current element. The syntax of the value of the style attribute is determined by the default style sheet language.

psxctl:Param.name: tabindex
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the position of the current element in the tabbing order for the current document. This value must be a number between 0 and 32767.

psxctl:Param.name: alt
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies alternate text the calendar picker icon, for user agents that cannot display images. The default value is "Calendar Pop-up"

psxctl:Param.name: src
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the location of the image resource used for the calendar picker icon. The default value is "../sys_resources/images/cal.gif"

psxctl:Param.name: height
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the height of the calendar picker icon. This parameter may be either a pixel or a percentage of the available vertical space. The default value is 20.

psxctl:Param.name: width
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the width of the calendar picker icon. This parameter may be either a pixel or a percentage of the available horizontal space. The default value is 20.

psxctl:Param.name: formname
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the name of the form that contains this control. It is used by the calendar's JavaScript. The default value is "EditForm"

psxctl:Param.name: time
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies whether time is to be displayed or not.If 0 then no time.

psxctl:ControlMeta.name: sys_CheckBoxGroup
psxctl:ControlMeta.psxctl:Description: a group of check boxes with the same HTML param name

psxctl:Param.name: id
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter assigns a name to an element. This name must be unique in a document.

psxctl:Param.name: class
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter assigns a class name or set of class names to an element. Any number of elements may be assigned the same class name or names. Multiple class names must be separated by white space characters. The default value is "datadisplay".

psxctl:Param.name: style
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies style information for the current element. The syntax of the value of the style attribute is determined by the default style sheet language.

psxctl:Param.name: columncount
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the number of column(s) displayed.

psxctl:Param.name: columnwidth
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the width of the column in pixels or percentage.

psxctl:Param.name: width
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the width of the applet. This parameter may be either a pixel or a percentage of the available horizontal space. The default value is "700".

psxctl:Param.name: height
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the height of the applet. This parameter may be either a pixel or a percentage of the available vertical space. The default value is 250.

psxctl:Param.name: tree_src_url
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the location of the xml that will defines the tree

psxctl:Param.name: formname
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: name of the form that contains this control

psxctl:ControlMeta.name: sys_DropDownSingle
psxctl:ControlMeta.psxctl:Description: a drop down combo box for selecting a single value

psxctl:Param.name: id
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter assigns a name to an element. This name must be unique in a document.

psxctl:Param.name: class
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter assigns a class name or set of class names to an element. Any number of elements may be assigned the same class name or names. Multiple class names must be separated by white space characters. The default value is "datadisplay".

psxctl:Param.name: style
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies style information for the current element. The syntax of the value of the style attribute is determined by the default style sheet language.

psxctl:Param.name: size
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: If the element is presented as a scrolled list box, This parameter specifies the number of rows in the list that should be visible at the same time.

psxctl:Param.name: multiple
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: If set, this boolean attribute allows multiple selections. If not set, the element only permits single selections.

psxctl:Param.name: tabindex
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the position of the current element in the tabbing order for the current document. This value must be a number between 0 and 32767.

psxctl:Param.name: disabled
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: If set, this boolean attribute disables the control for user input.

psxctl:ControlMeta.name: sys_EditBox
psxctl:ControlMeta.psxctl:Description: The standard control for editing text: an <input type="text"> tag.

psxctl:Param.name: id
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter assigns a name to an element. This name must be unique in a document.

psxctl:Param.name: class
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter assigns a class name or set of class names to an element. Any number of elements may be assigned the same class name or names. Multiple class names must be separated by white space characters. The default value is "datadisplay".

psxctl:Param.name: style
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies style information for the current element. The syntax of the value of the style attribute is determined by the default style sheet language.

psxctl:Param.name: size
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter tells the user agent the initial width of the control. The width is given in number of characters. The default value is 50.

psxctl:Param.name: maxlength
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the maximum number of characters the user may enter. This number may exceed the specified size, in which case the user agent should offer a scrolling mechanism. The default value for This parameter is an unlimited number.

psxctl:Param.name: tabindex
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the position of the current element in the tabbing order for the current document. This value must be a number between 0 and 32767.

psxctl:Param.name: width
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the width of the inline frame. This parameter may be either a pixel or a percentage of the available horizontal space. The default value is "700".

psxctl:Param.name: height
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the height of the inline frame. This parameter may be either a pixel or a percentage of the available vertical space. The default value is 250.

psxctl:Param.name: config_src_url
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the location of the config.xml that will the control will use for configuration. This file must be in the /rx_resources/ephox folder. The default value is "config.xml".

psxctl:Param.name: config_download
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the location of the download directory The default value is "../rx_resources/ephox/editlivejava".

psxctl:Param.name: InlineLinkSlot
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the id of inline link slot. The inline search dialog box shows the content types that have at least one variant added to the inline link slot. The default value is system inline link slotid 103.

psxctl:Param.name: InlineImageSlot
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the id of inline image slot. The inline search dialog box shows the content types that have at least one variant added to the inline image slot. The default value is system inline image slotid 104.

psxctl:Param.name: InlineVariantSlot
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the id of inline variant slot. The inline search dialog box shows the content types that have at least one variant added to the inline variant slot. The default value is system inline variant slotid 105.

psxctl:Param.name: DebugLevel
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the debug level for the EditLive Applet. The allowed levels are (fatal, error, warn, info, debug, http)

psxctl:ControlMeta.name: sys_File
psxctl:ControlMeta.psxctl:Description: The standard control for uploading files: an <input type="file"> tag.

psxctl:Param.name: id
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter assigns a name to an element. This name must be unique in a document.

psxctl:Param.name: class
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter assigns a class name or set of class names to an element. Any number of elements may be assigned the same class name or names. Multiple class names must be separated by white space characters. The default value is "datadisplay".

psxctl:Param.name: style
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies style information for the current element. The syntax of the value of the style attribute is determined by the default style sheet language.

psxctl:Param.name: size
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter tells the user agent the initial width of the control. The width is given in pixels. The default value is 50.

psxctl:Param.name: tabindex
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the position of the current element in the tabbing order for the current document. This value must be a number between 0 and 32767.

psxctl:Param.name: cleartext
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter determines the text that will be displayed along with a checkbox when the field supports being cleared. The default value is 'Clear'.

psxctl:ControlMeta.name: sys_FileWord
psxctl:ControlMeta.psxctl:Description: a file upload input control with MS Word launcher

psxctl:Param.name: id
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter assigns a name to an element. This name must be unique in a document.

psxctl:Param.name: class
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter assigns a class name or set of class names to an element. Any number of elements may be assigned the same class name or names. Multiple class names must be separated by white space characters. The default value is "datadisplay".

psxctl:Param.name: style
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies style information for the current element. The syntax of the value of the style attribute is determined by the default style sheet language.

psxctl:Param.name: size
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter tells the user agent the initial width of the control. The width is given in pixels. The default value is 50.

psxctl:Param.name: tabindex
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the position of the current element in the tabbing order for the current document. This value must be a number between 0 and 32767.

psxctl:Param.name: cleartext
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter determines the text that will be displayed along with a checkbox when the field supports being cleared. The default value is 'Clear Word'.

psxctl:Param.name: RxContentEditorURL
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the absolute URL to the content editor of the current content item. The value is passed to the OCX control, which uses it to obtain the metadata fields of the current content item.

psxctl:Param.name: WordTemplateURL
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the absolute URL to retrieve the Microsoft Word template document which provides the macros used to edit content items within Word. The value is passed to the OCX control.

psxctl:Param.name: ContentBodyURL
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the absolute URL to retrieve the Microsoft Word document associated with the current content item. The value is passed to the OCX control.

psxctl:Param.name: InlineLinkSlot
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the id of inline link slot. The inline search dialog box shows the content types that have at least one variant added to the inline link slot. The default value is system inline link slotid 103.

psxctl:Param.name: InlineImageSlot
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the id of inline image slot. The inline search dialog box shows the content types that have at least one variant added to the inline image slot. The default value is system inline image slotid 104.

psxctl:Param.name: id
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter assigns a name to an element. This name must be unique in a document.

psxctl:Param.name: class
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter assigns a class name or set of class names to an element. Any number of elements may be assigned the same class name or names. Multiple class names must be separated by white space characters. The default value is "datadisplay".

psxctl:Param.name: style
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies style information for the current element. The syntax of the value of the style attribute is determined by the default style sheet language.

psxctl:Param.name: NAME
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter assigns a name to the inline frame. The default value is "dynamsg".

psxctl:Param.name: id
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter assigns a name to the inline frame element. This name must be unique in a document.

psxctl:Param.name: class
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter assigns a class name or set of class names to the inline frame element. Any number of elements may be assigned the same class name or names. Multiple class names must be separated by white space characters. The default value is "datadisplay".

psxctl:Param.name: style
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies style information for the inline frame element. The syntax of the value of the style attribute is determined by the default style sheet language.

psxctl:Param.name: width
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the width of the inline frame. This parameter may be either a pixel or a percentage of the available horizontal space. The default value is "100%".

psxctl:Param.name: height
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the height of the inline frame. This parameter may be either a pixel or a percentage of the available vertical space. The default value is 250.

psxctl:Param.name: SCROLLING
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies scrolling information for the inline frame. The default value is "auto".

psxctl:Param.name: SRC
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the location of the HTML that will populate the inline frame. The default value is "../sys_resources/texteditor/deditor.html".

psxctl:Param.name: formname
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the name of the form that contains this control. It is used by the editor's JavaScript. The default value is "EditForm"

psxctl:Param.name: InlineLinkSlot
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the id of inline link slot. The inline search dialog box shows the content types that have at least one variant added to the inline link slot. The default value is system inline link slotid 103.

psxctl:Param.name: InlineImageSlot
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the id of inline image slot. The inline search dialog box shows the content types that have at least one variant added to the inline image slot. The default value is system inline image slotid 104.

psxctl:Param.name: InlineVariantSlot
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the id of inlinevariant slot. The inline search dialog box shows the content types that have at least one variant added to the inline variant slot. The default value is system inline variant slotid 105.

psxctl:ControlMeta.name: sys_RadioButtons
psxctl:ControlMeta.psxctl:Description: A set of radio buttons for selecting a single value

psxctl:Param.name: class
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter assigns a class name or set of class names to an element. Any number of elements may be assigned the same class name or names. Multiple class names must be separated by white space characters. The default value is "datadisplay".

psxctl:Param.name: style
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies style information for the current element. The syntax of the value of the style attribute is determined by the default style sheet language.

psxctl:Param.name: tabindex
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the position of the current element in the tabbing order for the current document. This value must be a number between 0 and 32767.

psxctl:Param.name: id
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter assigns a name to the inline frame element. This name must be unique in a document.

psxctl:Param.name: class
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter assigns a class name or set of class names to the inline frame element. Any number of elements may be assigned the same class name or names. Multiple class names must be separated by white space characters. The default value is "datadisplay".

psxctl:Param.name: style
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies style information for the inline frame element. The syntax of the value of the style attribute is determined by the default style sheet language.

psxctl:Param.name: summary
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter provides a summary of the table's purpose and structure for user agents rendering to non-visual media such as speech and Braille.

psxctl:Param.name: width
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the desired width of the entire table. This parameter may be either a number of pixels or a percentage of the available horizontal space. The default value is "100%".

psxctl:Param.name: cellspacing
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies how much space the user agent should leave between the left side of the table and the left-hand side of the leftmost column, the top of the table and the top side of the topmost row, and so on for the right and bottom of the table. The attribute also specifies the amount of space to leave between cells. The default value is 0.

psxctl:Param.name: cellpadding
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the amount of space between the border of the cell and its contents. If the value of this attribute is a pixel length, all four margins should be this distance from the contents. If the value of the attribute is a percentage length, the top and bottom margins should be equally separated from the content based on a percentage of the available vertical space, and the left and right margins should be equally separated from the content based on a percentage of the available horizontal space. The default value is 5.

psxctl:Param.name: border
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the width (in pixels only) of the frame around the table. The default value is 1.

psxctl:ControlMeta.name: sys_SingleCheckBox
psxctl:ControlMeta.psxctl:Description: a group of check boxes with the same HTML param name

psxctl:Param.name: id
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: XHTML 1.0 attribute

psxctl:Param.name: class
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: XHTML 1.0 attribute

psxctl:Param.name: style
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: XHTML 1.0 attribute

psxctl:Param.name: id
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter assigns a name to the inline frame element. This name must be unique in a document.

psxctl:Param.name: style
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies style information for the inline frame element. The syntax of the value of the style attribute is determined by the default style sheet language.

psxctl:Param.name: summary
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter provides a summary of the table's purpose and structure for user agents rendering to non-visual media such as speech and Braille.

psxctl:Param.name: width
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the desired width of the entire table. This parameter may be either a number of pixels or a percentage of the available horizontal space. The default value is "100%".

psxctl:Param.name: cellspacing
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies how much space the user agent should leave between the left side of the table and the left-hand side of the leftmost column, the top of the table and the top side of the topmost row, and so on for the right and bottom of the table. The attribute also specifies the amount of space to leave between cells. The default value is 0.

psxctl:Param.name: cellpadding
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the amount of space between the border of the cell and its contents. If the value of this attribute is a pixel length, all four margins should be this distance from the contents. If the value of the attribute is a percentage length, the top and bottom margins should be equally separated from the content based on a percentage of the available vertical space, and the left and right margins should be equally separated from the content based on a percentage of the available horizontal space. The default value is 5.

psxctl:Param.name: border
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the width (in pixels only) of the frame around the table. The default value is 1.

psxctl:Param.name: id
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter assigns a name to an element. This name must be unique in a document.

psxctl:Param.name: class
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter assigns a class name or set of class names to an element. Any number of elements may be assigned the same class name or names. Multiple class names must be separated by white space characters. The default value is "datadisplay".

psxctl:Param.name: style
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies style information for the current element. The syntax of the value of the style attribute is determined by the default style sheet language.

psxctl:Param.name: rows
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the number of visible text lines. The default value is 4.

psxctl:Param.name: cols
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the visible width in average character widths. The default value is 80.

psxctl:Param.name: tabindex
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the position of the current element in the tabbing order for the current document. This value must be a number between 0 and 32767.

psxctl:ControlMeta.name: sys_VariantDropDown
psxctl:ControlMeta.psxctl:Description: a drop down combo box for selecting a single variant

psxctl:Param.name: class
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter assigns a class name or set of class names to the inline frame element. Any number of elements may be assigned the same class name or names. Multiple class names must be separated by white space characters. The default value is "datadisplay".

psxctl:Param.name: style

psxctl:Param.name: multiple
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: If set, this boolean attribute allows multiple selections. If not set, the element only permits single selections.

psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies the position of the current element in the tabbing order for the current document. This value must be a number between 0 and 32767.

psxctl:Param.name: OutputFormat
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter selects the output format (snippet or page).

psxctl:ControlMeta.name: sys_webImageFX

psxctl:Param.name: style
psxctl:Param.psxctl:Description: This parameter specifies style information for the current element. The syntax of the value of the style attribute is determined by the default style sheet language.

psxctl:Param.name: height
